Interface Shape

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Circle, ComposedShape, Polygon, PolygonDyn, PolygonVect, Rectangle, Triangle

    public interface Shape
extends java.lang.Comparable
    Shape interface represents geometric shapes like circle,triangle,rectangle,polygons etc. in general Shape interface extends from Comparable interface

      Decrements shape coordinates by 1.

      Draws the shape to a panel.
